articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian President Putin
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Russian President Putin
Sochi, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK who is taking part in the opening ceremony of the 22nd Winter Olympic Games as an honorary guest, met Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin, president of the Russian Federation, in Sochi on Friday.
					 Kim Yong Nam courteously conveyed greetings sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to the Russian president.
					
					 The Russian president expressed his profound thanks for them and asked Kim Yong Nam to convey his sincere regard to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam had a talk with the Russian president on the issue of developing the traditional DPRK-Russia cooperative relations in a friendly atmosphere.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Heads of Various States and UN Secretary General
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Heads of Various States and UN Secretary General
Sochi, February 7 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly who is participating in the opening ceremony of the 22nd Winter Olympic Games as an honorary guest, met heads of various states and the  UN Secretary General in Sochi on Friday.
					 Kim Yong Nam met Xi Jinping, president of the People's Republic of China, and had a friendly talk with him.
					
					 He courteously conveyed greetings sent by supreme leader Kim Jong Un to President Xi Jinping. 
					
					 Xi Jinping expressed deep thanks for them and asked Kim Yong Nam to convey his sincere regard to Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Meanwhile, Kim Yong Nam separately met Tsakhiagiin Elbegdorj, president of Mongolia, Nursultan Nazarbayev, president of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Serge Sarkissian, president of the Republic of Armenia, and Ban Ki Moon, secretary general of the United Nations.

articles.title: DPRK Ambassador to Nepal Appointed
articles.content:
DPRK Ambassador to Nepal Appointed
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Hak was appointed as DPRK ambassador to Nepal, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.

articles.title: GFTUK Delegation Leaves for Italy, Russia
articles.content:
GFTUK Delegation Leaves for Italy, Russia
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) led by Kim Tong Son, vice-chairman of its Central Committee, left here Saturday to participate in the meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions to be held in Italy and visit Russia.

articles.title: Meeting of Co-chairmen of Pomminryon Held
articles.content:
Meeting of Co-chairmen of Pomminryon Held
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The 14th meeting of co-chairmen of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) was held Saturday by way of exchanging facsimile messages among the north, south and overseas headquarters.
					 The meeting discussed the 2014 action program of Pomminryon to open a new phase for independent reunification, peace and prosperity by uniting close in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 A report was made at the meeting.
					
					 The report said that Pomminryon fully supports the crucial proposal and open letter of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK which reflect the unshakable will for national independence and great unity of the nation and the idea of patriotism and clearly indicate the practical ways of paving a wide avenue for improving the relations between the north and the south.
					
					 It indicated tasks and ways for Pomminryon to hold higher the slogan "Let's usher in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity by concerted efforts of our nation!"
					
					 It continued:
					
					 Pomminryon will advance in line with the three principles of national reunification and the historic north-south joint declaration.
					
					 All issues arising in the inter-Korean relations and the cause of the country's reunification should be solved on the basis of them and Koreans should not allow any slight attempt of outside forces to interfere in the issue of the country's reunification and internal affairs of the nation and strongly oppose and reject it.
					
					 Pomminryon will take the lead in striving hard to pave a wide avenue for improving the inter-Korean relations in the idea of By Our Nation Itself.
					
					 Pomminryon will vehemently reject all acts of vitiating the climate for improving the inter-Korean relations and all sorts of mud-slinging and hostile acts obstructive to it on the principle of placing the wishes and interests common to the nation above all and intensify the movement for peace against war to hold in check joint military exercises for aggression under various codenames, in particular, and moves for arms build-up.
					
					 Pomminryon will put the great unity of the nation on a higher level through positive solidarity activities with the people of various circles at home and overseas.
					
					 Pomminryon will hold diverse pro-reunification meetings with splendor  on various occasions including the 42nd anniversary of the July 4 joint statement, the  14th anniversary of the  June 15 joint declaration, the 7th anniversary of the October 4 declaration and the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation by concerted efforts of people of various circles at home and abroad including All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration for the purpose of creating an environment and climate favorable for improving the inter-Korean relations and carrying forward the era of June 15 reunification this year without fail.
					
					 The report underscored the need to unite close under the patriotic banner, the banner of By Our Nation Itself to dynamically advance in the van of the struggle for accomplishing the sacred cause of opening a new epochal phase of achieving independent reunification, peace and prosperity.
					
					 A joint resolution of the North, South and Overseas Headquarters of Pomminryon was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 The resolution said that Pomminryon would take the lead in the efforts to firmly maintain the principle of national independence and the stand of By Our Nation Itself and fully preserve and implement the north-south joint declaration.
					
					 It clarified the stand to conduct positive activities to create a climate for improving the inter-Korean relations and give further momentum to the great unity of the nation through diverse solidarity activities with people of various circles at home and abroad.
					
					 It called for further consolidating the organization of Pomminryon and boosting the solidarity among the north, south and overseas sides.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize Awarded to Exemplary Committees, Officials and Members of Youth League
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize Awarded to Exemplary Committees, Officials and Members of Youth League
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize was awarded to nine primary committees of the youth league and 25 officials and members of the youth league on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 They have firmly built the youth league organizations into the ranks of the Songun young vanguard by working hard to defend and glorify the idea of the Workers' Party of Korea on the youth movement and its leadership exploits, performed exploits in defending the motherland and building a thriving socialist nation and distinguished themselves in study and organizational life. 
					
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize Awarded to Exemplary KCU Members
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize Awarded to Exemplary KCU Members
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Il Children Honor Prize was awarded to 197 exemplary members of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 They set an example in study, organizational life of the KCU, social and political activities and do-good-thing movement to learn from the glorious childhood of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and firmly prepare themselves to be talents and pillars of thriving Korea equipped with knowledge, good moral character and good health.
					
					 A relevant decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK was promulgated on Wednesday.

articles.title: New Poster of 18th Kimjongilia Festival Produced
articles.content:
New Poster of 18th Kimjongilia Festival Produced
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A poster of the 18th Kimjongilia Festival to be held on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was produced.
					The poster has a slogan reflecting the faith of all service personnel and people "The great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il will always be with us" written in block letter. There are letters "The Day of the Shining Star" and the logo of the festival in the upper part of the poster and the letters "The 18th Kimjongilia Festival" and the venue and period of the festival in its lower part.
					
					Depicted in its center are the Jong Il Peak and Kimjongilia in full bloom.

articles.title: New Posters Produced
articles.content:
New Posters Produced
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Mansudae Art Studio, the Central Fine Art Studio and Pyongyang University of Fine Arts produced posters calling for ushering in a fresh heyday in construction.
					 Posters "Let us usher in a heyday in construction by thoroughly carrying out the party's idea on Juche-based architecture!", "Top priority to supply of equipment and materials necessary for construction!", "Let's properly combine three factors of construction!" and "Let us apply national character and modern style to construction!" truthfully represent a high degree of enthusiasm of service personnel and people to bring about fresh miracles and innovations in construction.
					
					 "Let's usher in a heyday in construction in response to the party's call!", "For great innovations, leap forward in construction!" and "Raise strong wind of 'Masikryong Speed' in construction!" fully reflect the firm will of all service personnel and people to perform heroic feats in the on-going worthwhile great drive for construction.

articles.title: DPRK Wrestler Bags Gold in Int'l Tournament
articles.content:
DPRK Wrestler Bags Gold in Int'l Tournament
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- DPRK wrestler Jong Hak Jin took the first place in 57kg category event of the International Senior FS Wrestling Tournament "Takhti Cup."
					 He won an overwhelming victory over his Kazak rival, bagging a gold medal.
					
					 Meanwhile, Yang Kyong Il placed third in the same category event.

articles.title: Matches for Int'l Marathon Held in DPRK
articles.content:
Matches for Int'l Marathon Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Marathon races took place to win qualification for the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon in Pyongyang, Haeju and other areas of the DPRK.
					 Athletes from different sports teams had to run 45 kilometers, a little more than the standard distance of 42.195 km, in the matches.
					
					 Marathoners of the April 25 Sports Team became winners in men and women's races in Pyongyang and those of the Suyangsan Sports Team and the Sports Team of Kim Jong Thae Haeju University of Education No. 1 in the matches in Haeju.
					
					 Many of the participants reached the standard record to be qualified for the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon, which is to be held here to mark the Day of the Sun (April 15), President Kim Il Sung's birthday.

articles.title: 22nd Winter Olympic Games Open in Sochi
articles.content:
Matches for Int'l Marathon Held in DPRK
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Marathon races took place to win qualification for the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon in Pyongyang, Haeju and other areas of the DPRK.
					 Athletes from different sports teams had to run 45 kilometers, a little more than the standard distance of 42.195 km, in the matches.
					
					 Marathoners of the April 25 Sports Team became winners in men and women's races in Pyongyang and those of the Suyangsan Sports Team and the Sports Team of Kim Jong Thae Haeju University of Education No. 1 in the matches in Haeju.
					
					 Many of the participants reached the standard record to be qualified for the IAAF-27th Mangyongdae Prize Marathon, which is to be held here to mark the Day of the Sun (April 15), President Kim Il Sung's birthday.

articles.title: Natural Wonders Observed in Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
Natural Wonders Observed in Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Natural wonders have been recently observed around the secret camp of Mt. Paektu in Korea, where leader Kim Jong Il's birthplace is situated.
					 In this regard, Pak Hyong Jun, chief of the Paektusan Secret Camp Meteorological Observatory, told KCNA:
					
					 There was a solar halo in the sky above Jong Il Peak from 12:30 to 15:00 on Thursday.
					
					 Buds began to burst on the willow branches along the Sobaek Stream on Tuesday afternoon, earlier than usual. Such phenomenon was also witnessed on trees around the lodging house for study tourists run by the Management Office for Revolutionary Battle Sites in the Secret Camp of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 The inhabitants are glad to hear the news, saying that willow catkin in the Paektusan Secret Camp heralds the spring.

articles.title: Japanese Ultra-Right Forces Accused of Justifying Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
Japanese Ultra-Right Forces Accused of Justifying Sexual Slavery
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Choson Sinbo, the organ of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), on Feb. 7 carried an article accusing the Japanese ultra-right forces of justifying the sexual slavery enforced by Japan in the past and its history of aggression and seeking a war.
					 The article recalled that the newly appointed NHK president talked such rubbish at a press interview that "any country which fought a war used comfort girls" and complained that "there is claim that it was only Japan which forcibly drafted those women."
					
					 Worse still, the prime minister and a Cabinet minister of Japan justified its past crimes, asserting "there was no problem," the article noted, adding:
					
					 The Osaka mayor, who had been strongly censured by the public at home and abroad for his assertion that "there exists no evidence for proving the coercive nature" as regards the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army in May last year, again talked rubbish justifying his claim as an "established logic".
					
					 This whole string of reckless remarks made by the Japanese ultra-right forces is attributable to the Japanese government's wrong outlook on history.
					
					 Japan's colonial rule over Korea was a history of plunder.
					
					 The cruelest of Japan's crimes was the sexual slavery enforced by it against Korean women at that time. Japan's infringement upon the rights of Korean women and the repeated reckless remarks made by Japanese ultra-right forces are rubbing salt into the wounds of the victims of sexual slavery not only on the Korean peninsula but also in other parts of Asia and Europe.
					
					 Such acts of Japan justifying its past sexual slavery and history of aggression cannot be construed otherwise than the acts of rushing headlong into a war.
					
					 The article demanded the newly appointed NHK president immediately step down as he oft-repeats his anachronistic outpourings.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Intention for World Hegemony
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits U.S. Intention for World Hegemony
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. has become evermore vociferous about the strengthening of its "missile defence capabilities" to cope with the DPRK's missile development.
					Some days ago, the military bellicose forces at a hearing of the Armed Service Committee of the U.S. House of Representatives underscored the need for expanding "missile defence capabilities", asserting that north Korea tops the list of challenges to the U.S. troops in Asia and that north Korea's nuclear and missile programmes and its provocation remain an existing threat.
					
					Their remarks are a revelation of the U.S. sinister intention to keep military supremacy in the Asia-Pacific region by expanding and upgrading its MD (missile defence system) in the region under the pretext of the DPRK's "threat" and thus containing its potential rivals.
					
					It remains an open secret that the U.S. is putting spurs to its moves of establishing MD in the region in line with the strategy of world domination.
					
					Those moves give a glimpse of the U.S. ulterior aim to set up a powerful missile offensive system targeting Eurasia with the powers in the Asia-Pacific region and their strategic bases included in its operation sphere.
					
					Japan is speeding up the introduction of MD after receiving the U.S. allowance of joint development, production and deployment of MD, while deploying a large number of latest missiles in bases of the "Self-Defence Forces" and expanding the operation theatre of Aegis beyond their maritime borders.
					
					Raising a hue and cry over the "threat" from the DPRK, the U.S. has egged south Korea on to taking an active part in the U.S.-led building of MD. Furthermore, the U.S. has said that it is necessary for south Korea to introduce Kill Chain and MD in advance to deter the DPRK.
					
					As above-mentioned, the U.S. allegation about the "threat" from the DPRK is nothing but a sheer sophism to justify the moves for the establishment of MD and thus cover its aggressive and hegemonic purposes.
					
					Recently, the Russian foreign minister said that Russia does not want to see the U.S. deploying strategic nuclear bombers and carrier flotillas near its borders and installing components of the global MD in the region. And he stressed that with nothing can the U.S. justify its military steps taken under the pretext of "threat from north Korea".
					
					The U.S. sinister intention has been brought to light with the international community giving no ear to its groundless assertion.
					
					The U.S. moves for the MD establishment in the Asia-Pacific region are a criminal act pushing the regional situation to an extreme pitch of tension and sparking off a new confrontation and arms race.
					
					The U.S. should immediately stop its foolish moves to realize its world domination under the pretext of "missile threat" from the DPRK.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing About Decisive Turn in Agricultural Production
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Bringing About Decisive Turn in Agricultural Production
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday editorially calls for bringing about a decisive turn in rural construction in the new century and agricultural production through a vigorous drive to carry out the tasks set forth in the letter of supreme leader Kim Jong Un "Let Us Bring About Innovations in Agricultural Production under the Unfurled Banner of the Socialist Rural Theses".
					 The editorial says:
					
					 It is the unshakable will of Kim Jong Un to glorify for all ages the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in rural construction, regarding the theses on the socialist rural question as a great banner for rural construction in the new century of Juche, too.
					
					 When all officials and working people in the field of agriculture take his letter calling for making innovations in agricultural production as important guidelines under the uplifted banner of the theses, all rural areas across the country will translate the lifetime desires of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il into brilliant realities.
					
					 It is the firm determination of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) to do farming well and thus fulfill the grain production plan without fail this significant year marking the 50th anniversary of the theses and attain higher grain production goal and making fresh changes in all fields of rural economy from 2015 marking the 70th anniversary of the WPK.
					
					 Only when all subworkteam leaders, officials and working people in the field of agriculture thoroughly implement the important tasks laid down in Kim Jong Un's letter, is it possible to make leap forward and innovations in agricultural production this year when a heyday will be greeted by Songun Korea.
					
					 The final victory of the Korean revolution will come earlier only when the country attains self-sufficiency in food by doing farming well and brings about steady leap forward and innovations in all its parts by putting spurs to the building of an economic power.

articles.title: Ideological Confrontation with Imperialists Is War minus Gunfire: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Ideological Confrontation with Imperialists Is War minus Gunfire: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The struggle against the imperialists' cunning and persistent bourgeois ideological and cultural infiltration is the ideological confrontation with imperialism and a war minus gunfire, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The imperialists' ideological and cultural infiltration against the socialist countries and anti-imperialist independent countries is becoming evermore undisguised as the days go by.
					
					 If one is affected by bourgeois ideology and culture, serious consequences will be entailed.
					
					 The bourgeois ideology and culture are the most dangerous poisoning which makes people spiritual cripple and beasts stooping to brutal means and methods for their interests, ambition, wealth and luxury.
					
					 If people are infected by bourgeois ideology and culture, their class awareness will be diminished of its own accord and they will seek individual pleasure, wealth and luxury only.
					
					 If then, they will not fight against imperialists but abandon the revolutionary principle, opt for compromise, concession and submission and completely be disarmed ideologically and mentally.
					
					 This is eloquently evidenced by the tragic developments in those countries in which socialism collapsed.
					
					 The former East European socialist countries neglected the ideological work without vigilance over the imperialists' bourgeois ideological and cultural infiltration.
					
					 Therefore, people in those countries harbored illusion about capitalism and were undermined and degenerated ideologically and mentally. As a result, they made a mess of their socialist system.
					
					 This proves that to prevent the bourgeois ideological and cultural infiltration is a very important and urgent issue arising in achieving the country's independent development, progress and prosperity.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Censures U.S. Interference in Inter-Korean Relations
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Censures U.S. Interference in Inter-Korean Relations
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Concern and expectation for the improvement of the north-south relations are growing stronger among people at home and abroad thanks to the DPRK's positive measures. The U.S. is, however, taking an attitude quite contrary to this trend, claiming that it is interested in the "issue of north Korea's nuclear issue" only and will persistently push for its fulfillment of "promise of denuclearization" and "fulfillment of the international commitment."
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 Such behavior of the U.S. is not only an undisguised interference in the issue of the north-south relations, a matter of the Korean nation, but also a disgusting and foolish act against reunification as it eggs the south Korean authorities to react to the crucial proposal and open letter of compatriots by insisting on the nuclear issue.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The successive U.S. administrations have been displeased with any process of the north and the south to achieve reconciliation and unity and hamstrung their efforts to improve their relations by hook or by crook.
					
					 Whenever the dialogue and cooperation between the north and the south made progress thanks to the DPRK's positive efforts the U.S. moves against reunification reached their height.
					
					 A typical example of this is that the U.S. is now chilling the climate for mending the north-south relations by building up public opinion about the nuclear issue again.
					
					 The Obama administration is paying lip-service to "its support" to the improvement of the north-south relations. But this is nothing but a charade to conceal its black-hearted intention and true colors as an arch criminal against Korean reunification.
					
					 The U.S. is not qualified to say this or that about the nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the Korean peninsula would have not spawned, had the U.S. not threatened the DPRK by massively introducing nukes in south Korea and its vicinity and openly staging rackets for a nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. evermore undisguised interference in the issue of the north-south relations through vociferation about the nuclear issue would only bring its true colors as an arch criminal escalating tension and disturbing peace into bolder relief and invite bitterer domestic and foreign condemnation.

articles.title: Worship, Flunkeyism towards America Should Be Combated in S. Korea
articles.content:
Worship, Flunkeyism towards America Should Be Combated in S. Korea
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- In order to remove the source of distrust and confrontation between the north and the south of Korea and achieve peace and reunification by concerted efforts of all Koreans, it is necessary to root out worship and flunkeyism towards America and the idea of fearing and submitting to America within the nation. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					 The U.S. is the aggressor bringing the danger of a war, not peace to this land, a shameless occupier seeking permanent division and domination over the whole of Korea, not reunification desired by the Korean nation, and the sworn enemy who made the Koreans shake with towering grudge, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. Korea policy is aimed at permanent division and aggression against the Korean nation.
					
					 It is the ulterior intention of the U.S. to fish in troubled waters by escalating distrust and antagonism between fellow countrymen, keeping the Korean nation splitted into two. Hence, the U.S. has ceaselessly egged the south Korean authorities onto the confrontation with fellow countrymen for decades.
					
					 The tragic history of national division clearly proves what catastrophic consequences worship and flunkeyism towards America and the idea of fearing and submitting to America have brought to the efforts to reunify the country and hew out the independent destiny of the nation.
					
					 All the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad have made every possible effort for the reunification of the country and national unity for nearly 70 years but they have failed to yield desired results. This is attributable to worship and flunkeyism towards America and the idea of fearing and submitting to America aimed at antagonizing fellow countrymen while toeing the U.S. policy of dividing the nation and sowing the seeds of discord among them. 
					
					 Whether to pursue worship and flunkeyism towards America and the idea of fearing and submitting to America and whether to have the stand of By the Korean Nation Itself are a touchstone showing  whether one desires improved inter-Korean relations or not.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Magazine of Koreans in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Carried by Magazine of Koreans in Russia
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The International United Confederation of Koreans released the January issue of the monthly socio-political magazine Thongil.
					 The magazine carried the full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address illustrated with his photo making a historic address on the New Year Juche 103 (2014).
					
					 It carried photos of Kim Jong Un inspecting the command of Unit 534 of the Korean People's Army and giving field guidance to the State Academy of Sciences. It highlighted news dealing with his revolutionary activities.
					
					 It said in an article titled "250 mile Journey for National Liberation" that President Kim Il Sung set out on the road of the 250 mile journey for national liberation on January 22, 1925 in his teens with his firm resolution to win back the country usurped by the Japanese imperialists, adding that the day helped achieve the historic cause of national liberation and usher in a new era of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 The magazine carried statements of social organizations of Russia supporting Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.
					
					 It informed its readers of news that the Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea sent a notice to the Ministry of Unification of south Korea as regards the reunion of separated families and their relatives from the north and the south.
					
					 It also carried an article written by a Russian media man which said the UN sanctions against the DPRK are based on the most dastardly double standards and other articles.

articles.title: New Year Address of Kim Jong Un Carried by Joint Bulletin of Organizations of Britain
articles.content:
New Year Address of Kim Jong Un Carried by Joint Bulletin of Organizations of Britain
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association carried the New Year Address made by supreme leader Kim Jong Un in a joint special bulletin on February 1.

articles.title: Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Celebrated in South Africa
articles.content:
Greatest Holidays of DPRK to Be Celebrated in South Africa
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- There took place an inaugural ceremony of the South African preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (Day of the Sun) and the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) in Mfumalanga Province on Monday. 
					 Bonakele Majuba, secretary of the Mfumalaga Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party and chairman of the South African Association of Friendship and Solidarity with Korean People, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to widely introduce the revolutionary careers and exploits of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il between February 3 and April 18. 
					
					 A message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the inaugural ceremony.

articles.title: DPRK's Significant Days Observed in Britain
articles.content:
DPRK's Significant Days Observed in Britain
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint special bulletin titled "Star of independence" on Feb. 1 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) and the 40th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme for modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 The bulletin carried the following article illustrated with photos of Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un:
					
					 The revolutionary career of Kim Jong Il was the life of a legendary great man who brought about epoch-making victories and miracles, weathering the stern test of history.
					
					 Kim Jong Il, who was born and grew up to be the son of the people, cherished the noblest outlook on the people and fully embodied it in his ideological and theoretical activities and revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Kim Jong Il laid down all guidelines to be adhered to by the Workers' Party of Korea, the army and people of the DPRK including the line of the Songun revolution and ideas and theories on building the party, army and people's government. These ideological and theoretical exploits of Kim Jong Il go beyond human imagination.
					
					 Thanks to his energetic leadership the single-minded unity of the whole society became unshakable and the Korean People's Army turned into a-match-for-a-hundred revolutionary armed forces having all modern offensive and defensive means and an army strong in idea and faith.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a gifted thinker and theoretician and rare statesman who glorified the DPRK as a dignified politico-ideological power before the whole world.

articles.title: Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Supported by Thai, Slovenian Organizations
articles.content:
Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Supported by Thai, Slovenian Organizations
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Thailand and Slovenia issued statements on January 24 and 30 in support of the open letter sent by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK to the south Korean side.
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association recalled that the NDC of the DPRK sent an open letter to the authorities, various political parties, social organizations and people of various circles of south Korea by a special order of the first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 It expressed hope that the north-south relations would improve to help achieve reunification, peace and stability on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Slovenia-DPRK Friendship Association welcomed the action taken by the DPRK to totally stop provoking and slandering the other side. It went on:
					
					 The south Korean authorities should cancel the plan to stage joint military exercises with the U.S. from late February for the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 They should not thoughtlessly doubt the patience and sincere efforts of the DPRK and hastily deny them.
					
					 Only when all hostile military acts are completely stopped and climate for reconciliation and unity is created, will all issues between the north and the south be settled in conformity with the will of the nation.
					
					 We appeal to the south Korean authorities to positively respond to the proposal of the DPRK to pave a wide avenue for mending the north-south ties by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.

articles.title: Proposal of DPRK Supported by Nepali Political Parties, Organizations and Institutions
articles.content:
Proposal of DPRK Supported by Nepali Political Parties, Organizations and Institutions
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- 49 Nepali political parties, organizations and institutions made public a joint statement on January 29 in support of the crucial proposal and open letter of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK. They included the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), Nepal Communist Party (United), Nepal Worker-Peasant Party, Nepali National Memorial Committee for President Kim Il Sung and Leader Kim Jong Il, Nepal-Korea Friendship Association, Nepal Institute for the Juche Studies and the Newspaper Gorkha Express.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Political parties, organizations and institutions of Nepal sincerely hope for the reunification and peace of Korea. 
					
					 We are deeply touched by the crucial proposal and open letter of the NDC of the DPRK. 
					
					 We fully support the crucial proposal and open letter which reflect the desire of all the Korean people to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification, peace and prosperity of Korea by the concerted efforts of the Koreans in the idea of by the Korean nation itself. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should put an end to the hostile policy towards the fellow countrymen and make a bold decision to cancel the joint military drills to be staged in collusion with outside forces.
					
					 We urge the south Korean authorities to sincerely implement the historic June 15 North-South Joint Declaration in order to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve durable peace on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should positively respond to the crucial proposal and open letter of the NDC of the DPRK.

articles.title: Proposal and Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Supported
articles.content:
Proposal and Open Letter of NDC of DPRK Supported
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The crucial proposal and open letter of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK were supported by the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association and a Kuwaiti personage on January 26.
					 The association in its statement hoped that the south Korean authorities would positively respond to the fair and aboveboard proposals of the NDC of the DPRK.
					
					 Yousef Al Amiri, president of the Kuwait House of Works who doubles as chairman of the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, expressed full support for the efforts of the DPRK to remove distrust between the north and the south of Korea and mend their relations.
					
					 He expressed belief that the peace-loving initiative and efforts of the DPRK for improving the relations between the north and the south and achieving the security of the Korean peninsula would prove successful.

articles.title: Cancellation of Projected Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Demanded in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
Cancellation of Projected Key Resolve and Foal Eagle Demanded in Foreign Countries
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- South African and Austrian political parties made public statements on Jan. 29 and 30 in support of the crucial proposal and open letter of the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 The Gauteng Provincial Committee of the South African Communist Party in the statement fully supported the crucial proposal and open letter of the NDC of the DPRK to pave a wide avenue for improving the inter-Korean relations by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities halt at once not only all military provocations threatening the peace and security on the Korean peninsula such as Key Resolve and Foal Eagle scheduled to start late in February but also the smear campaign. 
					
					 It reiterated its will to always stand by the Korean people struggling for the accomplishment of their just cause.
					
					 The Vienna, 21 County Committee of the Communist Party of Austria said it could clearly understand the DPRK's will to achieve Korea's reunification and regional peace and security through the crucial proposal and open letter.
					
					 The south Korean authorities has no reason to turn down the DPRK's proposal for putting an end to hurling slanders and calumnies at the other side, it said and went on:
					
					 We demand the south Korean authorities immediately accept the reasonable crucial proposal and open letter of the DPRK and halt the war exercises unconditionally.
					
					 We will as ever stand by the Workers' Party of Korea and Korean people.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Libya
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Celebrated in Libya
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- A Libyan preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) was inaugurated in Tarabulus on Feb. 3.
					 The chairman of the Libya-DPRK Friendship Association who doubles as acting secretary general of the Sunbula International Friendship Club was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The preparatory committee decided to organize diverse political and cultural events in praise of the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Bulgarian Organization
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Bulgarian Organization
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- The Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association issued a special bulletin on January 29 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 The bulletin edited articles under various titles illustrated with a photo of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It in its article titled "Birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il" said that it is the greatest exploit performed by him on behalf of humankind that he defended the socialist cause. It went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored immortal classic works in the closing period of the 20th century when the imperialists talked a lot about the "end of socialism," thus scientifically clarifying the reason why socialism collapsed in some countries.
					
					 He was a master of ideas and theories as he further developed and enriched the immortal Juche idea.
					
					 He always met with soldiers and people during his field guidance and learned about realities and sought ways of settling problems.
					
					 It was his great exploit that he successfully carried forward and developed the cause of the preceding leader.
					
					 The exploits performed by Kim Jong Il will always go down in history.
					
					 The bulletin in its article titled "Sports power" pointed out that supreme leader Kim Jong Un has paid great attention to the country's development of sports.
					
					 It introduced the eye-opening successes made by DPRK players in recent international games.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Observed by Foreign Papers
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Observed by Foreign Papers
Pyongyang, February 8 (KCNA) -- Foreign papers carried special write-ups on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) from January 29 to February 1.
					 The Iranian newspaper Iran News allotted one whole page to an article titled "Declaration of history" and others illustrated with photos documenting revolutionary activities of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper in its article titled "Exploits performed by leader Kim Jong Il in socialist cause" said:
					
					 It is the greatest exploit performed by Kim Jong Il that he firmly defended the socialist cause.
					
					 He defended Korean-style socialism, smashing the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle it by enforcing the Songun politics.
					
					 The Cambodian newspaper Kmae Amata carried an article titled "Eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission" illustrated with a photo of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper noted that Kim Jong Il established the state machinery with the NDC as its pivot and provided a firm legal guarantee for the Songun politics, laying a groundwork for the DPRK's eternal prosperity.
					
					 He consolidated the politico-ideological position of the country as firm as a rock and provided a reliable foundation for building a thriving nation.
					
					 The Ethiopian newspaper Reporter carried an article titled "Immortal exploits performed in the global cause of independence" illustrated with a photo of smiling Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The paper recalled that Kim Jong Il led the global cause of independence to victory through his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities and energetic leadership, adding he would be always alive in the hearts of progressive humankind.

articles.title: Nombrado embajador coreano en Nepal
articles.content:
Nombrado embajador coreano en Nepal
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- De acuerdo con un decreto del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, Kim Yong Hak fue designado como nuevo embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la RPDC a acreditarse en Nepal.

articles.title: Tiene lugar XIV reunión de copresidencia de APRP
articles.content:
Tiene lugar XIV reunión de copresidencia de APRP
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el día 8 la XIV reunión de la copresidencia de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificación de la Patria según la transmisión facsimilar entre el Norte, el Sur y el ultramar. 
					El foro discutió el rumbo de actividades de la APRP de 2014 para abrir la nueva coyuntura de la reunificación independiente, la paz y la prosperidad con las fuerzas unidas de toda la nación en el interior y exterior del país bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					En la ocasión hubo el informe. 
					
					El informe señala que la APRP apoya totalmente la propuesta importante y la carta abierta del Comité de Defensa Nacional de la República Popular Democrática de Corea que están penetradas por el ideal patriótico y la firme voluntad de independencia y unidad nacionales y aclaran los remedios realistas para abrir la ruta de mejoramiento de las relaciones íntercoreanas. 
					
					Indica las tareas y remedios para sostener en alto la consigna de "¡Abramos la nueva era de la reunificación independiente, la paz y la prosperidad con las fuerzas unidas de nuestra nación!":
					
					La APRP mantendrá con más firmeza los Tres Principios de la Reunificación de la Patria y la histórica Declaración Conjunta Norte-Sur.
					
					Ateniéndose a ellos, resolverá todos los problemas que se presentan en las relaciones íntercoreanas y en el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificación y rechazará tajantemente la intervención de las fuerzas extranjeras en el tema de reunificación del país y otros asuntos internos nacionales. 
					
					Se esforzará al frente por abrir la coyuntura de mejoramiento de las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas mediante el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					En el principio de dar prioridad a las demandas e intereses comunes de la nación, rechazará las calumnias y los actos hostiles de toda índole que entenebrecen y ponen obstáculos al ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones íntercoreanas y dinamizará el movimiento por la paz y contra la guerra para frenar los ejercicios militares conjuntos agresivos de distintos tipos y el aumento armamentista. 
					
					Promoverá en una nueva etapa la gran unidad nacional con las actividades solidarias con distintos estratos dentro y fuera del país. 
					
					Es necesario abrir con solemnidad con los esfuerzos conjuntos del Comité Conjunto Nacional de 15 de Junio y distintos estratos del interior y exterior del país diversos actos por la reunificación con motivo del 42º aniversario de la publicación de la Declaración Conjunta del 4 de Julio, el 14º aniversario de la publicación de la Declaración Conjunta del 15 de Junio, el 7º aniversario de la publicación de la Declaración del 4 de Octubre, el 69º aniversario de la liberación de la patria, etc. para preparar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones íntercoreanas y continuar sin falta este año la era de reunificación del 15 de Junio. 
					
					Por último, el informe insiste en lograr la unidad nacional bajo la bandera del patriotismo y del ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y marchar a pasos firmes al frente del cumplimiento de la sagrada causa para abrir la nueva coyuntura de viraje de reunificación independiente, paz y prosperidad. 
					
					En la ocasión las direcciones norteña, sureña y ultramarina de la APRP aprobaron la resolución conjunta. 
					
					La nota afirma que la APRP mantendrá con firmeza el principio de la independencia nacional y la posición de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y se esforzará al frente por mantener y ejecutar la Declaración Conjunta Norte-Sur. 
					
					Continúa que desarrollará con dinamismo las actividades para preparar el ambiente favorable a la mejora de las relaciones íntercoreanas e impulsará la gran unidad nacional a través de diversas actividades de solidaridad con distintos estratos dentro y fuera del país. 
					
					Manifiesta la decisión de consolidar las organizaciones de la APRP y fortalecer la solidaridad tripartita entre el Norte, el Sur y el ultramar.

articles.title: ACNC denuncia intento hegemónico de EE.UU.
articles.content:
ACNC denuncia intento hegemónico de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- EE.UU. habla tanto del aumento de la "capacidad de defensa antimisiles" frente al desarrollo de misiles de la República Popular Democrática de Corea. 
					En la reciente audiencia del comité militar de la Cámara de Representantes, los belicistas de la capa militar norteamericana subrayaron la necesidad de ampliar su "capacidad de defensa antimisil" arguyendo que "el Norte de Corea es el primero de los desafíos con que tropiezan las tropas norteamericanas en Asia" y que "son amenazas existentes los programas de armas nucleares y misiles del Norte de Corea y sus provocaciones". 
					
					Esto es una expresión del siniestro intento de contrarrestar a los rivales potenciales y mantener la hegemonía militar al ampliar el sistema antimisiles en la región de Asia-Pacífico pretextando la "amenaza" de alguien. 
					
					No es un secreto que EE.UU. da acicate al establecimiento del sistema antimisiles en la región de Asia-Pacífico según su estrategia de hegemonía mundial. 
					
					Eso significa la formación del sistema de ataque de misiles contra el continente euroasiático y su teatro operacional comprende las potencias regionales y sus bases estratégicas. 
					
					Con el permiso de EE.UU. sobre el desarrollo común, la producción y el emplazamiento del sistema de defensa antimisiles, Japón acelera la introducción del mismo y al mismo tiempo, emplaza muchos misiles ultramodernos en las bases de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" y amplía la esfera operacional del buque Aegis dotado de misil interceptor más allá de las aguas jurisdiccionales. 
					
					EE.UU. vino instigando al Sur de Corea a incorporarse a su sistema antimisiles pretextando tanto la "amenaza" de la RPDC. 
					
					Ahora hace al Sur de Corea insistir públicamente en establecer con antelación el sistema de ataque preventivo Kill Chain y el de defensa antimisil para procurar el "disuasivo anti-Norte de Corea". 
					
					Pero, esto no pasa de ser una sofistería para encubrir su intento agresivo y hegemónico. 
					
					Hace poco, el canciller ruso dijo que su país no desea el emplazamiento de los cazabombarderos estratégicos nucleares y las flotillas de portaaviones en las cercanías de las fronteras del país ni el establecimiento de los componentes del sistema antimisiles de EE.UU. de alcance global.
					
					Aclaró que son injustificables las medidas norteamericanas tomadas bajo el rótulo de hacer frente a la "amenaza del Norte de Corea". 
					
					Como vemos, ya se puso al desnudo la verdadera intención de EE.UU. y el mundo no hace caso de sus mentiras. 
					
					Los esfuerzos de EE.UU. por establecer el sistema antimisiles en la región de Asia-Pacífico resultan un crimen que agrava extremadamente la situación regional y produce nuevo enfrentamiento y carrera armamentista. 
					
					EE.UU. debe dejar sus absurdas acciones encaminadas a alcanzar sus objetivos hegemónicos pretextando la "amenaza" de misiles de la RPDC.

articles.title: Enfrentamiento ideológico con imperialismo es guerra sin tiroteo, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Enfrentamiento ideológico con imperialismo es guerra sin tiroteo, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hoy día, la lucha contra la penetración obstinada de ideología y cultura burguesas es el enfrentamiento ideológico y la guerra sin detonaciones con los imperialistas. 
					Apunta así el diario Rodong Sinmun en un artículo individual de este sábado y continúa: 
					
					Se torna cada día más abierta la penetración ideológica y cultural de los imperialistas contra los países socialistas y los antiimperialistas e independientes.
					
					La ideología y cultura burguesas son el veneno ideológico más peligroso que deforma a las personas como psicópatas capaces de cualquier cosa para sus intereses, codicias y opulencia. 
					
					Los contagiados de la ideología y cultura burguesas abandonan los principios revolucionarios, en lugar de luchar con intransigencia contra los imperialistas, y al final, se concilian, ceden y se arrodillan ante ellos desarmados ideológicamente. 
					
					Lo evidencia la realidad trágica de los países donde fracasó el socialismo. 
					
					Los ex países socialistas de Europa Oriental no levantaron la guardia ante la penetración de ideología y cultura burguesas desestimando la labor ideológica.
					
					Como resultado, los habitantes de esos países abrigaron la ilusión del capitalismo y fueron descompuestos en lo ideológico y espiritual, lo cual causó el colapso del socialismo. 
					
					Esta lección enseña que frustrar la ofensiva ideológica-cultural es una cuestión muy importante y apremiante para lograr el desarrollo independiente, el progreso y la prosperidad del país.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza servilismo a EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza servilismo a EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- En un artículo individual divulgado este sábado, el diario Rodong Sinmun apunta que para eliminar la causa de desconfianza y enfrentamiento entre ambas partes coreanas y lograr la reunificación y la paz con las fuerzas unidas de todos los compatriotas, hay que erradicar en el interior de la nación el culto y la conciencia servil a EE.UU.
					EE.UU. es el invasor, cínico ocupante y enemigo jurado del pueblo coreano. Pretende imponer la guerra a la nación coreana, dividirla perpetuamente y dominar todo el territorio coreano. 
					
					EE.UU. tiene el siniestro intento de dividir a la nación coreana en dos partes y agravar la desconfianza y el antagonismo fratricidas y sacar provechos de ello. 
					
					Por eso, durante varios decenios, ha venido instigando a las autoridades surcoreanas a la confrontación fratricida. 
					
					La historia trágica de división nacional demuestra bien que el culto y el servilismo a EE.UU. causaron consecuencias catastróficas en la empresa por la reunificación del país y  en la forja independiente del destino nacional. 
					
					Durante cerca de 70 años, todos los coreanos en el Norte, el Sur y en ultramar hicieron ingentes esfuerzos por reunificar el país y lograr la unidad nacional.
					
					Pero, esos esfuerzos resultaron infructíferos debido al culto y la conciencia servil a EE.UU. En adhesión a la artimaña de ese imperio de meter cizañas en la nación coreana, los contagiados del servilismo a EE.UU. hostilizan injustamente a la parte connacional.
					
					Pues, perseguir el culto y la sumisión a EE.UU. o tomar la posición de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" determina la voluntad de mejorar o no las relaciones íntercoreanas.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia intervención de EE.UU. en asuntos íntercoreanos
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia intervención de EE.UU. en asuntos íntercoreanos
Pyongyang, 8 de febrero (ACNC) -- Si bien se elevan ahora la atención y la esperanza nacionales y extranjeros sobre el mejoramiento de relaciones íntercoreanas gracias a las medidas de la República Popular Democrática de Corea, EE.UU. toma la actitud contraria diciendo que está interesado sólo en el "problema nuclear del Norte (de Corea)" y le demandará de continuo la "promesa de desnuclearización" y el "cumplimiento de compromisos internacionales".
					En un comentario individual difundido este sábado, el diario Rodong Sinmun señala que esa conducta de EE.UU. significa intervención abierta en el problema de relaciones íntercoreanas y locura anti-reunificación que incita a las autoridades surcoreanas a responder con el problema nuclear a la propuesta importante y la carta abierta de la connacional RPDC, y continúa:
					
					Históricamente, disgustado de la reconciliación y la unidad entre el Norte y el Sur de Corea, el imperio ha venido obstaculizando en todos los sentidos el mejoramiento de relaciones íntercoreanas.
					
					En particular, cada vez que se lograba algún avance en el diálogo y la cooperación Norte-Sur  gracias a los esfuerzos protagónicos de la RPDC, llegaban al clímax las acciones anti-reunificación de EE.UU.
					
					La administración Obama habla en lugares públicos que "apoya" el mejoramiento de las relaciones íntercoreanas. Pero, esto no pasa de ser un engaño para ocultar su naturaleza de obstaculizador no. 1 de la reunificación de Corea.
					
					EE.UU. no tiene calidad para hablar del problema nuclear de la Península Coreana.
					
					Si ese país no hubiera realizado los ejercicios de guerra nuclear con armas nucleares introducidos en el suelo surcoreano y su contorno amenazando así a la RPDC, no habría surgido el problema nuclear de la Península Coreana.
					
					A medida que EE.UU. interviene más abiertamente en los asuntos de relaciones íntercoreanas pretextando el problema nuclear, el mundo conocerá mejor su naturaleza de agravador de tensiones y perturbador de paz y elevará el grado de las críticas al imperio.
